prompt:

For EACH market:
1. Estimate the TRUE PROBABILITY based on news context
2. Calculate EDGE vs market price
3. Only recommend trades with 10%+ edge


Market 1:
Title: Will West Bromwich Albion FC win on 2025-12-12?
Current Market Price: 60.0% (this is the market's implied probability)
Recent trade: $1,524.00 on No

📰 WEB SEARCH CONTEXT:
West Bromwich Albion FC is set to face Sheffield United FC today, December 12, 2025, at The Hawthorns in a crucial Championship match. The game is scheduled to kick off at 8:00 PM GMT.

**Recent Form:**

- **West Bromwich Albion:** The team has had a mixed performance recently, with a 3-2 loss to Southampton on December 9, 2025. ([espn.com](https://www.espn.com/soccer/match/_/gameId/744833/west-bromwich-albion-southampton?utm_source=openai)) They currently sit 12th in the league with 25 points from 18 matches.

- **Sheffield United:** Sheffield United has struggled on the road, suffering six defeats in eight Championship away games. ([feedinco.com](https://www.feedinco.com/predictions/2025-12-12/West-Brom-vs-Sheffield-Utd-prediction?utm_source=openai)) They are positioned 19th in the league with 22 points.

**Betting Odds:**

- **West Bromwich Albion to Win:** Odds of 2.56 at Smarkets. ([smarkets.com](https://smarkets.com/event/44754705/sport/football/england-championship/2025/12/12/20

---

Market 2:
Title: Will Trump establish a Gaza “Board of Peace” in 2025?
Current Market Price: 96.0% (this is the market's implied probability)
Recent trade: $1,188.35 on No
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/will-trump-establish-a-gaza-board-of-peace-in-2025

📰 WEB SEARCH CONTEXT:
As of December 12, 2025, the United States, under President Donald Trump's leadership, is in the process of establishing the "Board of Peace" to oversee the reconstruction and governance of the Gaza Strip. This initiative is part of a broader U.S.-brokered peace plan aimed at stabilizing the region following a prolonged conflict.

**Recent Developments:**

- **Announcement of the Board of Peace:** On December 10, 2025, President Trump announced plans to name the members of the Board of Peace early next year. He emphasized the board's significance, stating it would be "one of the most legendary boards ever," comprising leaders from the world's most influential countries. ([reuters.com](https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/trump-says-he-plans-name-gaza-board-peace-early-next-year-2025-12-10/?utm_source=openai))

- **Composition and Leadership:** The Board of Peace is set to be chaired by President Trump and will include approximately a dozen other Middle Eastern and Western leaders.

---

Market 3:
Title: Barcelona vs. Olympiacos B.C.
Current Market Price: 54.3% (this is the market's implied probability)
Recent trade: $1,000.00 on Barcelona
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/euroleague-barcelon-olympiac-2025-12-12

📰 WEB SEARCH CONTEXT:
FC Barcelona and Olympiacos B.C. are set to face off in a EuroLeague basketball game on December 12, 2025, at 7:30 PM CET (Central European Time) at the Palau Blaugrana in Barcelona, Spain. ([sportsbook.dexwin.bet](https://sportsbook.dexwin.bet/sportsbook/basketball/international-tournaments/euroleague/barcelona-olympiacos-1006000000000028544870?utm_source=openai))

**Recent Developments:**

- **FC Barcelona:** Under the leadership of coach Xavi Pascual, who took over after Joan Peñarroya's departure, Barcelona has shown significant improvement, securing seven wins in eight games across all competitions. ([as.com](https://as.com/baloncesto/acb/el-barcelona-sale-de-la-tumba-f202512-n/?utm_source=openai)) The team is on a four-game winning streak, enhancing their confidence ahead of this crucial match. ([as.com](https://as.com/baloncesto/euroliga/un-partido-grande-para-probar-la-solidez-del-barca-f202512-n/?utm_source=openai))

- **Olympiacos B.C.:** The Greek team has bolstered its rost

---


Provide predictions in the exact format specified.
system_prompt:
You are a prediction market expert analyzing Polymarket markets.
You have been provided with RECENT NEWS AND CONTEXT for each market from web search.

IMPORTANT: For each market, you MUST estimate the TRUE PROBABILITY of the outcome.
Compare your probability estimate to the market price to find EDGE (mispricing).

Edge = Your Probability - Market Probability
- Positive edge on YES side means market undervalues YES
- Negative edge means market overvalues YES (bet NO instead)

For each market, provide your prediction in this EXACT format:

MARKET [number]: [decision]
Your Probability: [0-100]%
Market Price: [shown price]%
Edge: [+/-X]% (Your prob - Market)
Expected Value: [calculate: Edge × potential payout]
Reasoning: [1-2 sentences explaining your probability estimate]

Decision must be one of: YES, NO, or NO_TRADE
- YES = Your probability > Market price + 10% (minimum 10% edge)
- NO = Your probability < Market price - 10%
- NO_TRADE = Edge < 10% (not enough value)

Be contrarian when you have conviction. Look for markets where news hasn't been priced in yet.
consensus_summary: The consensus shows strong agreement that Market 3 (Barcelona) offers a clear "YES" trade with a >10% edge, while Market 2 (Trump/Gaza) is widely seen as overpriced, though analysts disagree on the exact "NO" probability. For Market 1 (West Brom), opinions are split between "YES," "NO," and "NO_TRADE," indicating no clear edge. Overall, the only consistent trade recommendation across the models is a "YES" on Barcelona.

groq.response:

Your Probability: 55.0%

Edge: -5.0% (55 - 60)
Expected Value: -0.05 (Edge × potential payout, assuming 1:1 payout)
Reasoning: Given West Bromwich Albion's mixed recent form and Sheffield United's struggles on the road, the probability of West Bromwich Albion winning is slightly lower than the market price, but the edge is not sufficient to recommend a trade.

MARKET 2: NO

Reasoning: Although President Trump has announced plans to establish a "Board of Peace" in Gaza, the likelihood of its establishment in 2025 is not as high as the market price suggests, considering the complexity and challenges involved in such an initiative.

MARKET 3: YES
Your Probability: 65.0%
Market Price: 54.3%
Edge: +10.7% (65 - 54.3)
Expected Value: 0.107 (Edge × potential payout, assuming 1:1 payout)
Reasoning: Given FC Barcelona's significant improvement under coach Xavi Pascual, with seven wins in eight games, and their current four-game winning streak, the team's chances of winning against Olympiacos B.C. are higher than the market price, presenting a positive edge.

opus.response:
**MARKET 1: Will West Bromwich Albion FC win on 2025-12-12?**

MARKET 1: NO
Your Probability: 39%
Market Price: 60%
Edge: -21%
Expected Value: 21% × 2.5 = 52.5% return on NO bet
Reasoning: Betting odds of 2.56 imply only ~39% win probability for West Brom. They just lost 3-2 to Southampton and sit 12th in the table. While Sheffield United has poor away form, the market at 60% significantly overvalues West Brom's chances compared to bookmaker odds.

---

**MARKET 2: Will Trump establish a Gaza "Board of Peace" in 2025?**

MARKET 2: NO
Your Probability: 25%
Market Price: 96%
Edge: -71%
Expected Value: 71% × 25 = significant return on NO bet
Reasoning: The news explicitly states Trump plans to "name the members of the Board of Peace early next year" (2026), not in 2025. The board has been announced but NOT established yet - only 19 days remain in 2025. The market resolution likely requires actual establishment, not just announcement of plans.

---

**MARKET 3: Barcelona vs. Olympiacos B.C.**

MARKET 3: YES
Your Probability: 65%
Market Price: 54.3%
Edge: +10.7%
Expected Value: 10.7% × 1.84 = ~19.7% return
Reasoning: Barcelona is on a 7-1 run under new coach Xavi Pascual with a 4-game winning streak, playing at home (Palau Blaugrana). Home court advantage in EuroLeague is significant, and Barcelona's recent form surge suggests they're undervalued at 54.3%.

deepseek.response:
MARKET 1: NO_TRADE
Your Probability: 65%
Market Price: 60.0%
Edge: +5.0% (Your prob - Market)
Expected Value: 0.05 × (100/60 - 1) ≈ +3.33%
Reasoning: West Brom is at home against a team with poor away form, giving them an edge, but their own mixed results and league position limit confidence for a >10% mispricing.

MARKET 2: NO
Your Probability: 75%
Market Price: 96.0%
Edge: -21.0% (Your prob - Market)
Expected Value: -0.21 × (100/96 - 1) ≈ -0.88%
Reasoning: While Trump announced plans, the market prices near certainty for establishment in 2025, but political execution risks, delays, or redefinition of the board make a 96% probability vastly overstated.

MARKET 3: YES
Your Probability: 70%
Market Price: 54.3%
Edge: +15.7% (Your prob - Market)
Expected Value: 0.157 × (100/54.3 - 1) ≈ +13.2%
Reasoning: Barcelona is at home, under a new coach with strong recent form (7 wins in 8 games), creating a significant edge against an Olympiacos team whose recent context is incomplete but likely less favorable.

claude.response:
# Polymarket Predictions Analysis

## MARKET 1: NO_TRADE
Your Probability: 55%
Market Price: 60%
Edge: -5% (Your prob - Market)
Expected Value: Negative
Reasoning: West Brom at home vs struggling Sheffield United (6 losses in 8 away games) favors the home side, but West Brom's recent form is mixed (loss to Southampton) and they're only 12th in the table. The 60% market price seems fairly efficient given home advantage and opponent's poor away form. Insufficient edge for a trade.

---

## MARKET 2: YES
Your Probability: 98%
Market Price: 96%
Edge: +2% (Your prob - Market)
Expected Value: Insufficient
Reasoning: Trump has already announced on December 10, 2025 that he will name Board of Peace members "early next year" and confirmed it will be chaired by him with a dozen Middle Eastern and Western leaders. The board's establishment is essentially confirmed and in active implementation. However, only 2% edge doesn't meet the 10% threshold despite high conviction.

**DECISION: NO_TRADE** (Edge too small despite strong probability)

---

## MARKET 3: YES
Your Probability: 68%
Market Price: 54.3%
Edge: +13.7% (Your prob - Market)
Expected Value: Strong positive (+13.7% × payout)
Reasoning: Barcelona is playing at home (Palau Blaugrana) with exceptional recent form - 7 wins in 8 games across all competitions and currently on a 4-game winning streak under new coach Xavi Pascual. The momentum shift is significant and recent, likely not fully priced into the 54.3% market odds. Home court advantage plus hot streak justifies 68% probability.
